Module SoftEng_2024
Package SoftEng_2024.Model.ModelMessages

Class ModelMessage

java.lang.Object
SoftEng_2024.Model.ModelMessages.ModelMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BroadcastMessage, ChatErrorMessage, GameIsEndingMessage, LastPlayerStandingMessage, NumberOfMessages, OwnWhisperMessage, RemovedPlayerMessage, UpdatedAckMessage, UpdatedAvailableGoalsMessage, UpdatedBoardMessage, UpdatedColorMessage, UpdatedCurrentPlayerMessage, UpdatedErrorMessage, UpdatedGameStateMessage, UpdatedGoldDeckMessage, UpdatedHandMessage, UpdatedIsOnlineMessage, UpdatedNicknameMessage, UpdatedPlayerStateMessage, UpdatedPublicCardsMessage, UpdatedPublicGoalsMessage, UpdatedResourceDeckMessage, UpdatedStarterCardMessage, UpdatedWinnersMessage, WhisperMessage, WinnerDueToForfeitMessage
public abstract class ModelMessage extends Object implements Serializable
ModelMessage is an abstract class that serves as a base for various types of messages exchanged within the model of a software application.

This class implements Serializable, allowing instances to be serialized and sent across network connections or stored in files.

See Also:
